TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DbRawSqlQuery`1<TElement> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.IDbAsyncEnumerable, class System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.IDbAsyncEnumerable`1<!TElement>
Public Class DbRawSqlQuery(Of TElement) Implements IDbAsyncEnumerable(Of TElement), IEnumerable(Of TElement), IListSource
type DbRawSqlQuery<'Element> = class interface seq<'Element> interface IEnumerable interface IListSource interface IDbAsyncEnumerable<'Element> interface IDbAsyncEnumerable

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements returned by the query.
Docs.summary: Represents a SQL query for non-entities that is created from a and is executed using the connection from that context. Instances of this class are obtained from the instance. The query is not executed when this object is created; it is executed each time it is enumerated, for example by using foreach. SQL queries for entities are created using . See for a non-generic version of this class.
Docs.remarks: To be added.

Docs.param: A function to test each element for a condition.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously determines whether all the elements of the query satisfy a condition.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains true if every element of the query result passes the test in the specified predicate; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Multiple active operations on the same context instance are not supported. Use 'await' to ensure that any asynchronous operations have completed before calling another method on this context.

Docs.summary: Asynchronously returns the only element of the query, and throws an exception if there is not exactly one element in the sequence.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the single element of the query result.
